aircraft.value: Hornet Strike - AC-3926-234 at Regional Depot-C

defect_observed.value: Communication radio frequency drift. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Corrosion due to moisture accumulation in sealed compartment

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Communication Suite component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation

preventive_action.value: Update technical documentation with lessons learned

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions. Date: 05/10/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 07/10/2023 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 10/10/2023 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 10/10/2023 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 15/10/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Mission Critical
b) Defect Observed: Communication radio frequency drift. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Corrosion due to moisture accumulation in sealed compartment
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Communication Suite component.
Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation

ii. Preventive Action: Update technical documentation with lessons learned
d) Attributable Code: N2 - Defect Not Confirmed
